content: Define the module named TopModule with inputs a, b and output q.
source:
I would like you to implement a module named TopModule with the following interface. All input and output ports are one bit unless otherwise specified.

 - input  a
 - input  b
 - output q

content: Implement the combinational logic for output q based on the provided waveform. The output q is 1 only when both inputs a and b are 1.
source:
The module should implement a combinational circuit. Read the simulation waveforms to determine what the circuit does, then implement it.

  time  a  b  q
  0ns   0  0  0
  5ns   0  0  0
  10ns  0  0  0
  15ns  0  0  0
  20ns  0  0  0
  25ns  0  1  0
  30ns  0  1  0
  35ns  1  0  0
  40ns  1  0  0
  45ns  1  1  1
  50ns  1  1  1
  55ns  0  0  0
  60ns  0  0  0
  65ns  0  1  0
  70ns  0  1  0
  75ns  1  0  0
  80ns  1  0  0
  85ns  1  1  1
  90ns  1  1  1
